I was really impressed with the communication and services received with this purchase.Also, the specs of this laptop are perfect for the purpose intended, which is to cater to my educational requirements; furthermore, due to its high capabilities it can also be recommended for a small home business.I definitely will recommend this purchase and amazon to anyone!! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product, but with few initial hiccups
Reviews.Author: Hamid Azmi
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is the first time for me to use a Mac and I'm really happy with the move. It's durable and fast with excellent graphics. That said, in the short time that I've been using it, it has crashed twice and that's something that bothers me, because I thought was something I should not expect with a Mac.

Reviews.Title: Love the looks and the performance
Reviews.Author: hc
Reviews.Content: Good in every aspect. With the softwares supporting the use of other OS makes it much better.May its heavier and costlier but cant complain

Reviews.Title: Gift for grandson
Reviews.Author: celnegdo
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my grand son. I was amazed at how fast the delivery was. He said he loves it and has been very helpful in his art class.

Reviews.Title: If you can afford it, this is the choice
Reviews.Author: Zora
Reviews.Content: I deal with both Macs and PCs and for a Laptop to be so problem free is just refreshing. All of my Laptops that are PCs have been sent to the shop this year and are brand new (no older than 1 year). For some reason Macs just aren't prone to catching viruses and the operating system is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this computer
Reviews.Author: Magdalena del Olmo
Reviews.Content: It is perfect. My son needs it for his school and it also serves our personal needs. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: My dream machine
Reviews.Author: J. Oakley
Reviews.Content: Having had the SSD on my 2010 Macbook Air fail twice in a year I was very concerned about the reliability - and fixability - of the Macbook Airs so I traded up to a regular hard drive (750GB) Macbook Pro. I was concerned that the downgrade to the regular hard drive would make it unacceptably slow but I need not have worried - this machine is the fastest I have ever owned... and with 8GB of RAM I can run a Windows 7 guest machine in seamless mode all the time... and it gives me the fastest Windows machine I've ever owned too!I am in heaven.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Moresi "Jman"
Reviews.Content: PRO:I love the product itself and I had great service from Amazon.CON:I don't know if the "spacebar" being curved as a mount and the "7" key's point of the keyboard's backlight subtly dimmer than the rest of the keyboard is the way Apple wants it or just some other unstable matter occurred during the whole shipping process. I understand I should call Apple Tech Support about any variables(which is my purpose of writing this con) as variables could be a bigger future problem.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Revman67
Reviews.Content: I've been  using mac for over 10 years and will always use mac! The new os is great on my macbook pro!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Device
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoying this Mac, having Boot-camp really just is the cherry on top of this awesome piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I should have gotten one of these a long time ago and not tried to stay with Windows.  2 more.

Reviews.Title: Apple at it's best.....
Reviews.Author: Chris Landers
Reviews.Content: Hands down in the creative, educational and just web-based world Apple wins big. This unit has been tried and true in performance, and unless you are in a market segment where Retina is important don't waste your money. This unit and or it's big brother the 15'inch will do well. That said Apple has it's issues just like any pc manufacture, the unit that shipped had a faulty display thus I could not rate at any higher than 4-stars. Design wise Apple could do better in many aspects!

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: damowng "damowng"
Reviews.Content: It is a very very very good laptop! I love it very much! I will give five stars! Good! Good!

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Hannah Sinnwell
Reviews.Content: This computer came within the dates specified, and everything matched expectations perfectly. :) Great product, great price, great delivery, and great service. Love it. :)

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: Oscar Baeza R-
Reviews.Content: great, construction and software are excellent. Have it docked via the thunderbold display, use it for home music studio and work as well. great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great little computer
Reviews.Author: AmazonAddict "Cody"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my sister to take with her to college. It's much more lightweight than my MBP w/ Retina 15" and is much easier on the battery life. It's a great computer.

Reviews.Title: Long time Windows User, College Student and Programmer now a Mac convert!
Reviews.Author: Zee
Reviews.Content: I've been an avid Windows user since Windows 95 and have gone to great lengths to trash talk apple products  in the past. I had the same reasons as most PC users: the price, the overbearing restrictions of OSX and lack of support for games.That being said, I use this computer mainly for school. It's not extremely thin and light but definitely on the lighter end compared to most laptops. The backlit keyboard is an excellent feature when writing in the dark at night and the battery life is excellent.The OSX operating system is far more intuitive than I thought. I'm truly impressed and  thoroughly impressed with this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Nothing beats a Macbook!
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: I've had so many laptops and desktops and nothing beats a Macbook! I've had my Macbook Pro for two years already and it works just as good as when I bought it. I've always had issues with PCs slowing down and getting viruses, but not with my Macbook. It definitely is expensive but it is well worth it! The Macbook Pro is durable and sturdy. The software is wonderful and easy to use. I have nothing to complain about my Macbook. The only thing that went wrong was my hard drive went faulty after a year but it was so easy and cheap to replace it with a new one. I haven't had any problems since. I hope to get many more years out of it.

Reviews.Title: This is great
Reviews.Author: Jonathan A BentonSr
Reviews.Content: Daughter really loves this lap top. Will use when she goes off to school this fall, to North Western University.

Reviews.Title: Not what I remembered
Reviews.Author: Annie J. Chang
Reviews.Content: The last time I had a MacBook was the 13" white one that came out in 2007. I LOVED that. After it got stolen a few years later I went back to being a PC user with an HP. I guess I came back to Mac with expectations or something but there's something that's not fulfilling me with this laptop which I don't remember having with the old Macbooks.. sometimes images don't load when I'm using Safari and Chrome. There seems to be a lot of times when the mouse disappears or things just take forever to load or type in programs and the internet.. otherwise I do love it!

Reviews.Title: Way too good
Reviews.Author: waterballs87
Reviews.Content: This product is worth every penny. No computer I have ever had has amounted to this. I am completely in love.

Reviews.Title: finally
Reviews.Author: MARIA A SAAVEDRA
Reviews.Content: i love my i phone , now i have my dream come true with my mac , more than i was expecting

Reviews.Title: As expected, It's great
Reviews.Author: Raama Srivatsan
Reviews.Content: Where to begin?Build Quality:As is expected, It's made with the highest quality in materials. Soft touch, anodized aluminum with laser cut precision and no flaws. I love the little rubber seam that runs all the way around the edge of the screen that protects the screen from being scratched by the palm pads of the inner side. The keys are durable, and only start to wear out (become shiny) after about 1,000,000 hours of continuous use. I have another 2008 Black MacBook That has seen the most lengthy writing sessions with much sweating upon, and the keys still feel as good as new. I don't like the fact that the Screen is a fingerprint and dust magnet, but I fix that by wiping the screen down as a thing I do every Saturday Morning. The paint indicators on the side of the MacBook indicating which port is which has slowly become rubbed out from abrasion, but I know what port is now, so its ok. I wish I still had the paint in case I needed to sell it. The fan exhaust is located right under the screen hinge, and since it is easily covered, the laptop easily heats up. The trackpad is as smooth as velvet. I wish it was a entire button, so the trackpad wouldnt have to bend down when you press it at the top, but I've gotten used to the old way of thinking and using my thumb as a button-presser.Software:I can't say muchI love Macintosh. Grew up with it from OS 8I love how seamless and flawless it is. I can't wait for Mavericks, and I know it'll be a bestseller.I really love the fact that Mac has an app store with its constantly growing database, and great games.I wish iLife came hooked up to your account as soon as you enter your apple id with icloud so you can update it as part of your app collection, but since it doesnt cost that much, its coolHardware:Apple always has bleeding edge performance and I love their support of everything out thereMy Mac rarely ever lags, and even when it does, (unless the fan is blocked), the fan is almost unnoticeable. I've heard that they fixed the problem with the new Retina Display MacBook Pro though with the adjusted frequency fans. I really want to try that out for my self.I also love the super fast Ivy Bridge 2.6 Ghz processor with Great battery life.They only fact that I wish they had done was refresh the ENTIRE Mac lineup along with the MacBook Air's when they changed the processors to Haswell.Overall:I love this product.I love appleJust wish they continued the color variety.I dont know how much effort it would take to make an anodized black macbook pro, macbook air, and a iMac, but if they did, I know that if they did, people would trip over each other just to get their hands on one of themI know I would.So until that happens, I'm sticking with this.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Judy T
Reviews.Content: I bought the MacBook Pro MD103LL/A on 7-30-13 and received it from Amazon (through DataVision) on 8-2-13.I've had this computer now for one week and love it.I also bought the AppleCare Protection Plan for this computer from Amazon on 7-30-13.I received that on 8-8-13, registered for this plan, and look forward to using it if the need should arise.

Reviews.Title: Great and fast
Reviews.Author: Nicky Rus
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended, insanely fast and great computer, doing heavy multi-taking and office work etc all at once and it just runs and processes flawlessly, the battery life is extremely great as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A
Reviews.Author: worldunix
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Kid for CollegeShe love itreplaced her older one that i now use :-)Get one you wont go wrong

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Hannan
Reviews.Content: Great computer, very happy with this purchase.Mac runs just the way you'd expect it to.No problems at all.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Mac Book Pro 13" Great Brand and Great price!
Reviews.Author: SuperClear
Reviews.Content: The Mac Book Pro 13" is a perfect Laptop if you want use it for your home.  If you are willing to make a lot of Foto and video editing, you should buy more RAM memory, up to 8 or 16 GB.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: ethan robert domaingue
Reviews.Content: i don't really have anything new to say about the Macbook Pro that you probably haven't already heard from someone else or from another review.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: s. francis725
Reviews.Content: I mean Mac is the best computer out there period! SO of course this one came through with the awesomeness!

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE - MAC FOREVER
Reviews.Author: MatthewJD
Reviews.Content: I would say I am a super user when it comes to my electronics. I use my computers for heavy social media, music, and pictures. This computer still acts like it did day one out of the box. Battery life is awesome, processor is great, never slows down. I use to be a windows user but they are junk. Spend the extra money for something that will last!!!

Reviews.Title: MacPro Newbie
Reviews.Author: Jamey Olsen "Keishidojo"
Reviews.Content: Where to start, well the 13" MacBook Pro is just the right size for what I wanted, the keyboard is backlight (which is a big issue for me), the trackpad is awesome, and the overall functions are very nice.  I like the brightness and adjustments.  The little features are very well done.For a new Mac user, I can say there are some things that definitely take some getting used to.  I am still learning what all this little power PC can do, but I will say I like it.Core I78GB Ram750GB HDD13"OSX 10.8I have been able to make some really nice movies on this PC.  To see a sample of what I have been able to create with this Apple MacBook Pro check out on Youtube.com - Keishidojo (Bjj/MMA commercial, Jiu-Jitsu Fight Team, Reece, and the Youth Grappling Team) videos.  Also the OSX is well laid out to make things simple to share online and make these type of things easier.I would certainly buy this laptop again.

Reviews.Title: Mac...
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: What else can you say, its a mac. Replaced this one with my mac that was stolen, its a great computer.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Angelica Mezza
Reviews.Content: super fast, light and great. It came before the day it supposed to which is great. I don't have too much time with it, but right now Im happy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Esteban Sepulveda Sanhueza
Reviews.Content: after years of bad windows based computers now i dont have errors, blue screens and overwarmed laptop, the battery is great, it works for hours and every instrument i plug in works amazing.

Reviews.Title: Awesome computer
Reviews.Author: Russell Haston
Reviews.Content: I have always been a windows pc user but finally got tired of the stability issues and the layout of Windows 8. I purchased my first Mac and am glad I did. Rock solid platform that never crashes or hangs up. Wish I would have done this years ago.

Reviews.Title: macbook pro
Reviews.Author: Vali Dees
Reviews.Content: Great computer, works much better than my previous PC laptop!  Faster, better antenna, apple has different approaches for some uses but easy to adapt

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop (NEWEST VERSION)
Reviews.Author: Rodney Daniels Jr
Reviews.Content: It is very useful and my first MacBook Pro, everything is working fine. Thank YouGod Bless and God Loves You

Reviews.Title: Sorry for having missed out all these years on Apple products
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Sabatini
Reviews.Content: Having been a PC man since the beginning I am sorry I missed out all those years on Apple products!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: S. KAPOOR
Reviews.Content: My iBook G4 died & I had to get a new laptop. Since I have always used Apple products, the choice of Macbook Pro was obvious. I am very pleased with the best laptop around, namely Macbook Pro. For my use this was better than Macbook Air. This is my 6th Apple computer. The sequence is: 512 K Macintosh, Mac II, Power PC, iBook G4, iPad mini, Macbook Pro. I like the feel of this computer & hope this will last me through the rest of my days (@ 78+, age becomes an issue).

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Gina Polini
Reviews.Content: Got this MacBook for a great priced. It arrived super fast and well protected. Very happy. Excellent buy! Why would anyone buy it for more anywhere else?

Reviews.Title: Excellent laptop
Reviews.Author: luis laina
Reviews.Content: Thank you Steve jobs for this experience. All apple products are fantactic. its very faster and funtional.i am very happy with my apple purchases.

Reviews.Title: Gifted brain box
Reviews.Author: Joshua Tree 1973 "Harve"
Reviews.Content: This laptop was given as a gift. The receiver was full of superlatives for the quality and performance. It offers features and performance not offered by other laptops.

Reviews.Title: very good notebook
Reviews.Author: Hannibal
Reviews.Content: Excellent notebook for quality/price. I bought it for my daughter's birthday who has enjoyed it so much. She was able to edit a bunch of video clips and create a home video with music UN 5 hrs by using iMovie . That was the first time she uses a Mac!!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop.
Reviews.Author: rsfinsrq
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my Daughter in college. She absolutely loves this laptop. Great for students for their studies and as a media center in the dorm.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Having recently lost my old laptop I figured it was time to upgrade (go big or go home as my friends say), and that's just what I did.Excellent laptop, runs smooth, looks great and overall I couldn't be happier with my new Mac.The only think to note is that the top does get dirty (not the screen the actual casing of the laptop), other than that it's great!

Reviews.Title: New mac user
Reviews.Author: JOe
Reviews.Content: First time mac user and after one week windows feels like going back 15 years in time. I don't know why I didn't make the switch sooner...o ya because it's expensive. But so far it definitely feels worth the price.

Reviews.Title: best of all computers I've used
Reviews.Author: D. FRANEY
Reviews.Content: I've had more than 12 laptops and PC's at home and at work since 1994.  This is by far thee best, most reliable computer I could find.  I've have custom built PC's.  several dells and even a few IBM's.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Beloit
Reviews.Content: Have been using Apple products for years and have never been disappointed. I would recommend to any one lloking for a first class computer!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: This is the best laptop I have ever owned, and it was much cheaper to buy it on Amazon than through the Apple company itself. Perfect for all my graphic design classes I'm taking this year in college :-)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: tulasirao

Reviews.Author: Freddo
Reviews.Content: It is a mac product.. meaning.. highly overpriced.. however, it is still versatile, powerful and pretty which is what MAC lovers like about apple products.. isn't it?

Reviews.Title: I'm satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jamel Allen
Reviews.Content: Macs are beautiful and powerful, I bought this Mac for my production purposes. And the fact that it comes with an i5 processor definitely speeds things up

Reviews.Title: My first mac
Reviews.Author: yoyo
Reviews.Content: It was better than I thought it would. Much different from a pc. Still is going to take some time to get used to.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality computer- no need for higher GHZ
Reviews.Author: coolster
Reviews.Content: First off, must I say how impressed I am with this product. I am going to college next year and I needed a cheaper, quality computer for the goals I am trying to pursue. I have been working with this for a bit and it has yet failed me in any category.1) The resolution is still very high despite the lack of retina display (could not afford retina display2) You don't realize the 2.5 GHZ vs the next step up of 2.9GHZ unless you are an intense gamer and/or intense video editor3) Boots up in no time at all. I have had a couple of PC's and boy, it would take maybe 4 minutes to turn on. This takes maybe 30 seconds4) Music sounds great. Some people say it sounds "tinny," but it sounds perfectly fine to me5) Built-in apps are purely amazing. The only apps I had to get were Microsoft Word, Excel etc.6) Feels like a solid computer. Doesn't feel flimsy. The aluminum body sure makes it stand out.Overall, this computer is perfect for basically anyone in school and in normal life. PC people, don't give me excuses. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Gregg L. Friedman MD Psychiatrist, Hallandale Beach, FL
Reviews.Author: Julie L. Friedman
Reviews.Content: The Apple MacBook Pro 15.4 inch laptop is the best computer I have ever used in my life. It is very easy to navigate even for a novice. It has excellent speed and excellent memory. I love my Apple MacBook Pro and I give it 5 stars. By Gregg L. Friedman MD, Psychiatrist, Hallandale Beach, FL

Reviews.Title: Smooth sailing with this unit, like riding in a Cadillac. Or driving a good sports car.

Not cheep but worth the price.  ( I still like windows as it keeps me employed -- thanks for the job Bill.)

So thaks again Amazon hope soon enough you will be able to deliver product to Romania that is my home country. Thanks once again Todericiu Dragos Partenie

Reviews.Content: Great computer, considering my computer savy daughter chose it.  I brought another one for my other daughter and she loves it as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple Only

Reviews.Content: An Apple is the only computer I will buy.  This laptop for my daughter was on sale from Amazon and I had to jump on it because they don't usually sell for this low. Price was great, Delivery was great and, as always, the service was great.

Reviews.Content: Love it!  I get a discount on Apple products and Amazon's price beats that!  As with every Apple I've ever bought (this is items 6) I've seen nothin' but quality.

Reviews.Title: So far the best laptop On the market

Reviews.Content: Fast and reliable, sleek and top-notch technololgy, light but powerful without glitches, easy to use and an excellent apple support.

Reviews.Content: The MAc Book pro is an excellent product and being my first Macbook I love it ,and the packing it was received in was excellent and Black Friday deal was awesome!!Thanks!!

Reviews.Content: I have been using this macbook everyday for the last month to do all sorts of things: watch videos, listen to music, surf the internet, download. There has been no problem with anything. Its performance is like stated in its specs and the battery lives up to its expectations, if not more.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: My experience has been most satisfying so far. I received my laptop on time (frustration free packaging was good for me) This baby is working like a dream I am completely happy with my purchase... No complaints about the condition of the Mac :)

Reviews.Title: Better value than from any other retailer.

Reviews.Content: The same computer, when from Amazon, it's just cheaper and delivered faster than any other online retailers.I typically can save 10% by shopping at Amazon.Have been using the computer over 1 month, have not noticed any problem, I did upgrade to 8 GB memory and a SSD myself, can not speak about the original build though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Laptop
Reviews.Author: Andrew Humeniuk
Reviews.Content: Fast processor, super stable operating system with MAC OS X, installing Parallels 8 gives you the ability to run both Mac OS and Windows (as long as you buy the Windows OS). Being a PC user for many years to switch to a Mac I will not go back. Now I have an Apple and a PC in one unit. Very well built and solid, all metal, awesome display, using Photoshop on this is incredible. I also got the time capsule and everything automatically backs up. The server is easy to setup and use and have the whole family able to log into a home network.  Touch pad is neat, Magic Mouse is awesome too.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Gianluca Brancacci
Reviews.Content: I've always been an apple fan boy, but never had the money to buy a mac, only ipads and iphones, and this is my first mac, blew me away completely. LOVE IT <3

Reviews.Title: Macbook Pro 13
Reviews.Author: Chris Murphy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for music production and now i use it for everything, i use to use windows but now i just use the macbook as my desktop by using the thunderbolt port and take it with me when i go somewhere. its by far faster and more stable then my PC. I use pro tools, logic and Live and my PC would barely handle them and freeze up every 5 minutes. My mac has never once since i got it, its got sluggish but only because i had about 25 things open. i could never do that on my PC. And with the program Crossover i can install window applications to my mac the program cost about 50 bucks. and this mac will last a lot longer then my old PC, i can upgrade the RAM in a few years and be fine. i know people that use macs from 2005 and they still run like new.Pros:Size- Very portable, it fits in a backpack with enough room for 4 booksBattery Life- i only charge it once a day most of the timeBacklit keyboard is a life saverCons:Only 2 USB ports but i just use a hub when i need tooScreen can feel small at timesOverall its a nice and well built laptop i will be using it for a long time

Reviews.Title: Great Price - excellent machine
Reviews.Author: CA Buyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this machine during the Black Friday sale and got a pretty good price. Despite the Thanksgiving holiday period, it arrived on-time. What can I say about the Macbook Pro itself? Get one - you just haven't functioned until you have.

Reviews.Author: vinoanand
Reviews.Content: I got this one for thanks giving Offer for $962 :). It was wonderful deal for the wonderful product. Just loving It

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amelia
Reviews.Content: Great price and great laptop, easy to use and I would recommend it to everyone. Not super light but still a good one.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: this is my firts apple product and i love it. Its perfect, not much heavy. The baterry is very longer.

Reviews.Title: amazing Laptop
Reviews.Author: Uday
Reviews.Content: I was looking between different combinations of Dell and Apple. I found it toughest to decide between Dell ultra books and Apple. There is nothing wrong in Dell but I preferred Apple 13.4" Display 500 GB Hard Drive, 4 GB memory and Intel Core i5 Processor (3rd gen).. This is best laptop.Advantages:1. Although there  is a small learning curve for Mac OS to get some hands on - but as I am familiar with Linux I am very comfortable with Mac OS... this is the only thing I see difficult with Mac Book .... and this is advantage in other sense coz you will be amazingly in a new world of OS and features...... and even if you are too restricted to MS Windows, you still can have partitions and Windows installed virtually or through boot camp... with all native speed...2. Macs never crash... I never see any application taking too much to respond and going nasty ....and same applications I saw going goofy on my other laptop which carries Windows with similar hardware.3. There are no issues at all with internet security and virus attacks... I don't even have any anti-virus ...4. If you are restricted to Word processing applications like MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, you can have MS Office on Mac just in $119... but if you are not restricted but still want this capability, Open-office can solve all your problems...5. You can make Mac virtually same as Windows if you are Microsoft fan.... I am also Microsoft fan and doing the same....6. Incredible display, laptop size and weight.... great battery backup...7. accept trusted content only e.g. tools, software etc.8. No other brand has touch pad like Mac .... you don't even need lot of keys from keyboard or mouse when you have MacBook touch pad with youDisadvantages:1. Cost is more as compared to other brands. Other brands can come with higher configurations in same cost.... but Mac is Mac2. learning curve for OS and other features3. less free stuff compared to other communities... accept programs from trusted developers only

Reviews.Title: Joe241
Reviews.Author: Joe241
Reviews.Content: I chose this product for their exellent craftsmanship and fame of apple. I only have apple products because, they are very reliable and dependable.

Reviews.Content: creo que esta vez apple si que se la lucio con esta bella macbook pro de 13 inc!!!!! perfecT recomendada 100 x 100

Reviews.Content: I have been using my Apple MacBook Pro for six months and I love it. It works great and I am so happy I bought it. It is so light and is very fast. It would be very hard to use anything else

Reviews.Title: I am in LOVE!
Reviews.Author: M. Degges
Reviews.Content: Got my MacBook very quickly and was able to practically begin using it straight from the box.  It is so fast and easy to use!  My 14 year old daughter already has a MacBook so she helped me get this set up and ready to use.  I love it because we can share music from ITunes.  We both already have IPads, so this is a great addition to our connectiveness!  I highly recommend this-it's a perfect size!

Reviews.Title: Best laptop ever - obsolete configuration
Reviews.Author: JNT "JNT"
Reviews.Content: Selling a new MacBook Pro with a 5400 RPM hard drive is like selling a Rolls Royce with a Model T engine.  The old hard drives just cannot compare with the new SSD/Flash Drive, the same things used in iPads and thumb drives.  I have to wonder why Amazon is even selling this dinosaur.  I just bought a Pro with the high end i7 chip, 8 GB RAM and a 512GB SSD with speeds that almost defy belief.  Everything is practically instant.  The same goes for my iMac which I recently upgraded with a 521GB SSD. Frankly, while I was shopping I have not seen ANY 15" Pros with less than an SSD.  Obviously, they're out there but not here.  BTW, Amazon's quoted retail price is the Pro with the 512GB SSD - check the Apple Store.  Apple is charging a pretty penny for them.  One can get a 512GB Crucial from Amazon for about $400 which is good.  It cost me an extra $200 to have it installed in an iMac since I wasn't about to fool around with it.

Reviews.Title: Great computer

Reviews.Content: First one didn't work that I purchased from data vision out of ny . Worst place to buy anything.The new one I got from apple store is the bestI also purchased IPad mini , iMac, MacBook air... They are all great.Amazion rocks

Reviews.Content: I used to have a MacBook Pro 2008 and it became slow and groggy. The investment of a new MacBook Pro came at a price, but totally worth it for a good piece of mind.

Reviews.Title: MBP w/o retina
Reviews.Author: ItsJustBusiness
Reviews.Content: I looked at multiple Apple laptops and decided to purchase this one.  Even though there is MBP that is thin like the MacAir, I decided to purchase the one with the CD drive that would allow me to burn images which is a must have for me.  I chose this over the retina because of the price and retina is not a must have.  Honestly, can ppl really see the difference between a retina and non retina?  It's a beautiful laptop, I run parallel and fusion with no issues on the installed RAM. I upgraded my memory to 16gb and haven't had issues either.  I just hope this expensive laptop doesn't go dead like my friends...it did last him 5 good years before it bit the dust.

Reviews.Content: It is by apple so it is definitely amazing. it is really expensive though. but other than that, i am loving it!

Reviews.Content: I love my new macbook pro, mountain lion is amazing!, the core i5 processor works perfectly. I will upgrade the ram myself (because with this model you can you can do it) later on. but in resume this computer rocks!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product.
Reviews.Author: buyer boy
Reviews.Content: I have been a Windows user for a long time and have been eyeing on a Mac for past few months.I was in luck this Thanksgiving when Amazon listed this product for an unbelievable price- rather- best price anywhere.I seized the opportunity and am glad I did so..I have been using my Macbook for the past few days and am very impressed with the look and feel plus the ease of use of the laptop.My wife and I had no difficulty switching to a Mac from a PC and we love this...The product is very well designed and the attention to detail is simple awesome. I haven't used the product long enough to write a detailed technical review.Will probably find time in the near future to do so...All in all it was the best purchase of the year!!!

Reviews.Content: After performing the necessary upgrades I love this thing. I added the Samsung 830 256GB SDD and replaced the superdrive with a data dubbler with a Seagate 750GB SSHD and maxed out the memory to 16GB. Runs like a champ....
